message: I'll take the lion's share, but let's be fair. You get 10% now, but next round, you'll be making the offer.
I'll give you a smaller share this round, but I'm willing to be generous. Next round, you'll be making the offer.

This is my final offer.  I'm willing to give you a bit more than last round, but I need a larger share to make it worthwhile for me. If you reject this, the next round will be worse for you, and likely worse for me too.
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my best offer. Take it or leave it.
